title: Jess Latham
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053931/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053931/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Jess Latham**

Founder of [Blue Vinyl fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053931/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Blue%20Vinyl). ( [www.bvfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053931/http:/www.bvfonts.com/ "www.bvfonts.com"))  
Former author of [www.fontlover.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053931/http:/www.fontlover.com/ "www.fontlover.com").

**Additional Articles**  
 [The Vinyl Curtain: a conversation with Jess Latham & James Arboghast](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053931/http:/www.typodermic.com/vinylcurtain/)
author: paul d hunt
